constituent: favor, ten, needle, rice field, brains, heart
koohiiStory1: Too easy. Imagine the Wizard of OZ. There, the three heroes asked the Wizard for three FAVORS: the lion wanted courage of TEN men, the scarecrow wanted a BRAIN, and the tin man wanted a HEART. Ok, the lion bit is stretching but you have it memorized now, so who cares?
koohiiStory2: Do yourself a favor and take ten minutes to think about your decison...　RTK2:　エ　知恵　ちえ(wisdom)　　　ゴ　互恵　ごけい(reciprocal).
myStory: ơn huệ. ban phước. nhờ. mười lần nghĩ.
readingExamples: 恵贈 (けいぞう), 恵与 (けいよ), 恩恵 (おんけい), 恵む (めぐ.む)
words:
恵み(めぐみ): blessing
恵む(めぐむ): to bless, to show mercy to
恩恵(おんけい): grace, favor, blessing, benefit
知恵(ちえ): wisdom, wit, sagacity, sense, intelligence, advice
恵まれる(めぐまれる): be blessed with, be rich in
